name: Mad Tower Tycoon
description: Design your own skyscraper with more than 100 Floors. Rent offices, apartments or shops and build a financially lucrative skyscraper. Build cinemas, bars or a theater to satisfy your visitors and create an effective transport system with elevators and stairs.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP Processor: Intel Core2 Duo 2.4Ghz or Higher / AMD 3Ghz or Higher Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: DirectX 10 compatible with 1GB or better DirectX: Version 10 Storage: 2 GB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7, Windows 8, Windows 8.1, Windows 10 Processor: 2.8 GHz quad core or better Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: DirectX 10 compatible with 2GB or better DirectX: Version 10 Storage: 2 GB available space
